text: “Egh atrivir kam Isipɨn atrivimɨn atiatighan kogham. Egh, a mɨdorozir gumazir avɨrir ekiam akuvagh Isip ko mɨsogham. Eghtɨ Isipɨn atrivim mɨdorozir gumazir gavgavir taba ua bagh da inigh, egh uaghan Sirian atrivim ko mɨsogham. Eghtɨ gumazitaba Isipɨn atrivim gifarɨva a damutɨ a bar foghan kogh, egh kamaghɨn, a irɨgham.
